title: Calories in Miso Soup
meta_description: Discover calories in miso soup per serving, including protein, carbs, fat, sodium details, and easy tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard miso soup with fermented miso paste, tofu, wakame seaweed, green onions, and dashi broth; about 1 cup (240 ml) serving.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by miso type, brand, added ingredients, portion size, and preparation; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One cup of miso soup contains about 70 kcal and is high in sodium.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add extra firm tofu (50 g more)

faqs.q: How many calories in one cup of miso soup?
faqs.a: About 70 kcal for a standard serving with tofu and seaweed.

faqs.q: Is miso soup high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, typically around 1600 mg per cup due to the miso paste.

faqs.q: What are the macros in miso soup?
faqs.a: Per cup: 6 g protein, 8 g carbs, 2 g fat, with 1 g fiber.
Usually 0 mg, as it's plant-based with optional tofu.

faqs.q: How to reduce calories in miso soup?
faqs.a: Use less miso paste, skip tofu, or opt for low-calorie add-ins like more vegetables.
